#### Notice Description
The National Research Council (NRC) invites interested suppliers to submit their qualifications for contract **cb-59-49108814 (23-58192)**. NRC’s Automotive and Surface Transportation branch, a leading scientific research institution, intends to contract a technical writing consultant to provide services for the production of technical documentation and publications.

The successful bidder will be required to:

`* Develop and write technical publications`][]
`* Prepare technical data packages`][]
`* Support engineering projects for the Department of National Defense (DND)`][]

Deliverables will include the production of technical reports, publication guides, and standard operating procedures. The selected contractor will be expected to have professional-level skills in publishing / documents production software.
